snippet: Rafael Nadal reached the final of the Barcelona Open for the ninth time by beating German Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-3 6-3 on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal reached the final of the Barcelona Open for the ninth time by beating German Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-3 6-3 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Storms Into Final as He Chases Vilas Clay Record
headline.main: Nadal Storms Into Final as He Chases Vilas Clay Record
